title: RP Gift Icon Rakan and Xayah
body: Anyone else having trouble with gifting Rakan and Xayah using RP instead of IP and not getting the gifting icon?

replies.body: You will get the icon for gifting and the one for playing two games with them 2 weeks after the event ends.

Ohhhhhh Senpai, you noticed me~!!! <3

And no problem :3
I have already seen people with the Icon for playing two games with them. I haven't seen the gifting one though so maybe the two weeks only apply for the gift.
yeah i just got my 2 games one. i logged in and at the top right i had a chest from riot.
